src_original: śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda /  pattīyasi /  yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /  atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vātra gambhīre buddhagocare //  athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
tgt_original: 「大德世尊！ 我於如來所說契經，不生疑惑；
一切如來身語意業，無不清淨。

src_original: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 此日月輪，可令墮落；

src_original: sumeruḥ parvatarājā sthānāc calet /  na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
tgt_original: 妙高山王，可使傾動，諸佛所言，無有異也。

src_original: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /  teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 有諸眾生，信根不具，聞說諸佛甚深行處，作是思惟：

src_original: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya ettakā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavati /
tgt_original: 云何但念藥師琉璃光如來一佛名號，便獲爾所功德勝利？
